protein.general_function: Involved in calcium channel regulator activity
protein.specific_function: Phospholamban has been postulated to regulate the activity of the calcium pump of cardiac sarcoplasmic reticulum

reference.reference_text: Fujii J, Zarain-Herzberg A, Willard HF, Tada M, MacLennan DH: Structure of the rabbit phospholamban gene, cloning of the human cDNA, and assignment of the gene to human chromosome 6. J Biol Chem. 1991 Jun 25;266(18):11669-75.
